error-code-help.description: we have decided to use standard error codes in our applications so that it stays consistent across the system, this json file will hold the key value format
error-code-help.resolution-help: for this particular-help nothing to do

cartitem.auto_select.0001.description: usually happens when auto selection for the product has failed to find a store with the product
cartitem.auto_select.0001.resolution-help: contact support with your item information and user name, they should be able to get your queries sorted
